news: Cipher Mining (CIFR) stock surged 17% in premarket trading after reporting Q3 earnings in line with estimates and revenue below expectations. The company reported $164.2M in bitcoin mining revenue, driven by enhanced operations at its Texas data centers.
MarketBeat highlights Cipher Mining as one of the top Bitcoin stocks to watch, citing high trading volumes and growing investor interest in crypto mining equities.
Cipher Mining continues expansion into AI infrastructure, with plans for Google-backed AI data centers, boosting long-term growth outlook.
